history.proof: intros T a b c prf_ab prf_bc. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (T : System) (a b c : Term), SysPrf T (equal a b) -> SysPrf T (equal b c) -> SysPrf T (equal a c)

Premises:
System = fol.System LNN : Type
equal = fol.equal LNN : fol.Term LNN -> fol.Term LNN -> fol.Formula LNN
SysPrf = folProof.SysPrf LNN : fol.System LNN -> fol.Formula LNN -> Prop
eqSym : forall (T : System) (a b : Term), SysPrf T (equal a b) -> SysPrf T (equal b a)
eqRefl : forall (T : System) (a : Term), SysPrf T (equal a a)
BinInt.Z.divide_div_mul_exact : forall a b c : BinNums.Z, b <> BinNums.Z0 -> BinInt.Z.divide b a -> BinInt.Z.div (BinInt.Z.mul c a) b = BinInt.Z.mul c (BinInt.Z.div a b)
folLogic3.eqSym : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (a b : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.equal L a b) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.equal L b a)
forallE : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (forallH v f) -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN f v t)
existI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN f v t) -> SysPrf T (existH v f)
BinInt.Z.pow_gt_lin_r : forall a b : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.lt (BinNums.Zpos BinNums.xH) a -> BinInt.Z.le BinNums.Z0 b -> BinInt.Z.lt b (BinInt.Z.pow a b)
contradiction : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (notH f) -> SysPrf T g
andI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T (andH f g)
impE : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T f
BinInt.Z.div_lt_upper_bound : forall a b q : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.lt BinNums.Z0 b -> BinInt.Z.lt a (BinInt.Z.mul b q) -> BinInt.Z.lt (BinInt.Z.div a b) q
BinInt.Z.div_pos : forall a b : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.le BinNums.Z0 a -> BinInt.Z.lt BinNums.Z0 b -> BinInt.Z.le BinNums.Z0 (BinInt.Z.div a b)
BinInt.Z.div_exact : forall a b : BinNums.Z, b <> BinNums.Z0 -> a = BinInt.Z.mul b (BinInt.Z.div a b) < -> BinInt.Z.modulo a b = BinNums.Z0
BinInt.Z.div_mod : forall a b : BinNums.Z, b <> BinNums.Z0 -> a = BinInt.Z.add (BinInt.Z.mul b (BinInt.Z.div a b)) (BinInt.Z.modulo a b)
orE : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (orH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH f h) -> SysPrf T (impH g h) -> SysPrf T h
iffI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T (iffH f g)
nnI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (notH (notH f))
nnE : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), SysPrf T (notH (notH f)) -> SysPrf T f
iffTrans : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (iffH g h) -> SysPrf T (iffH f h)
impTrans : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g h) -> SysPrf T (impH f h)
ListExt.In_list_remove2 : forall (A : Set) (Aeq_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a b : A) (l : list A), In a (ListExt.list_remove A Aeq_dec b l) -> a <> b
orI1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (orH f g)
andE1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (andH f g) -> SysPrf T f
andE2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (andH f g) -> SysPrf T g
orI2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T (orH f g)
sysExtend : forall (T U : System) (f : Formula), Included (fol.Formula LNN) T U -> SysPrf T f -> SysPrf U f
BinInt.Z.pow_gt_1 : forall a b : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.lt (BinNums.Zpos BinNums.xH) a -> BinInt.Z.lt BinNums.Z0 b < -> BinInt.Z.lt (BinNums.Zpos BinNums.xH) (BinInt.Z.pow a b)
forallSimp : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat), SysPrf T (forallH v f) -> SysPrf T f
existSimp : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (existH v f)
absurd1 : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), SysPrf T (impH f (notH f)) -> SysPrf T (notH f)
forallI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T -> SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (forallH v f)
iffE1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH f g)
iffE2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
andSym : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (andH f g) -> SysPrf T (andH g f)
orSym : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (orH f g) -> SysPrf T (orH g f)
sysWeaken : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T g) f
iffSym : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (iffH g f)
existE : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNN g) -> SysPrf T (existH v f) -> SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T g
BinInt.Z.ldiff_le : forall a b : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.le BinNums.Z0 b -> BinInt.Z.ldiff a b = BinNums.Z0 -> BinInt.Z.le BinNums.Z0 a /\ BinInt.Z.le a b
nImp : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (andH f (notH g)) -> SysPrf T (notH (impH f g))

```coq
intros T a b c prf_ab prf_bc.
apply impE with (andH (equal a b) (notH (andH (equal b c) (notH (equal a c)))).
- apply andI.
  + assumption.
  + apply nnI. intros H. apply contradiction with (equal a c) (equal b c).
    * assumption.
    * apply contradiction with (equal a b) (equal c b).
      { assumption. }
      { apply andSym. assumption. }
- apply nImp. apply andI.
  + apply andSym. apply orSym. apply orI1. apply andE1. apply andSym. apply andE1. apply andSym. apply nnE. apply andE2. apply andSym. apply nnE. assumption.
  + apply nnI. intros H. apply contradiction with (andH (equal a b) (andH (equal b c) (notH (equal a c)))).
    * assumption.
    * apply andI.
      { assumption. }
      { apply andI.
        { apply orI2. apply andE2. apply nnE. apply andE1. apply andSym. assumption. }
        { apply andE2. apply nnE. apply andE1. apply andSym. apply nnE. assumption. }
      }
Qed.```

original: intros T a b c prf_ab prf_bc.
